## PluginNotFoundError class

Thrown when a required backend plugin (e.g. a third-party credential manager) is not installed on the current system.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class PluginNotFoundError extends VaultError 
```
**Extends:** [VaultError](./vaultkeeper.vaulterror.md)
